item.title: About
item.description: Virtualized System Meetup is a community of people interested in Kubernetes, containers, and related technologies. We meet weekly on Zoom to discuss the latest developments in the field, share ideas, and learn from each other. Zoom Join Zoom Meeting: Zoom Slack Join Slack Important Links UCSD CSE291: Virtualization Misc üìù If you wish to join ÂæÆ‰ø° (WeChat), please scan Sponsors The organizers spent a lot of time and effort to make this meetup possible.
